affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/110/120/130
COOLDOWN: 12
desc: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
notes:
Affects mechanical units.
Hits units up to 900 away.
lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
name: dragon_knight_breathe_fire

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/100/100/100
COOLDOWN: 12/11/10/9
desc: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
name: dragon_knight_dragon_tail

desc: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
name: dragon_knight_dragon_blood

attrib:
DURATION: 60 / 60 / 60
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 25 / 25 / 25
BONUS ATTACK RANGE: 372 / 372 / 372
cmb:
MANA COST: 50/50/50
COOLDOWN: 115
desc:
Dragon Knight can take the form of three powerful elder dragons.
LEVEL 1 - Green Dragon: Short poison damage over time on attack.
LEVEL 2 - Red Dragon: Splash damage on attack.
LEVEL 3 - Blue Dragon: Splash damage and frost attack that slows enemy units.
notes:
Level 1 Dragon's Corrosive Breath deals 20 damage per second and lasts 5 seconds, and works on structures.
Level 2 Dragon's Splash Attack deals 100/75/50% in a 100/200/250 radius, and has level 1's Corrosive Breath.
Level 3 Dragon's Frost Breath slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20%, lasting 3 seconds, and has level 1's Corrosive Breath..
lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
name: dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form
